stimulusHtml:
Capture and paste two program code segments you developed during the administration of this task that contain a variable being used in your program.

  • The first program code segment must show an assignment being made to the variable.
• The second program code segment must show the variable being used as part of fulfilling the programâ€™s purpose.

Provide a written response that:

(Approx. 75 words, exclusive of program code)

  • identifies the name of the variable being used in this response, and
• describes what the data contained in the variable represents in your program.
